dt: {bc}one of the terminal members of the vertebrate foot
{bc}the fore end of a foot or hoof
{bc}a terminal segment of a limb of an invertebrate
{bc}the forepart of something worn on the foot
{bc}a part that by its position or form is felt to resemble a toe
{bc}a lateral projection at one end or between the ends of a piece (such as a rod or bolt)
{bc}the lowest part (as of an embankment, dam, or cliff)

et: Middle English {it}to{/it}, from Old English {it}tā{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}zēha{/it} toe
shortdef: one of the terminal members of the vertebrate foot
the fore end of a foot or hoof
a terminal segment of a limb of an invertebrate

dt: {bc}to touch, reach, or drive with the toe
{bc}to drive (something, such as a nail) obliquely
{bc}to clinch or fasten by or with nails or rods so driven
{bc}to stand, walk, or be placed so that the toes assume an indicated position or direction
{bc}to conform rigorously to a rule or standard

shortdef: to touch, reach, or drive with the toe
to drive (something, such as a nail) obliquely; also : to clinch or fasten by or with nails or rods so driven

dt: {bc}to cause someone to be alert and prepared to deal with problems

dt.t: The boss made regular inspections in order {it}to keep{/it} employees {it}on their toes{/it}.

shortdef: to cause someone to be alert and prepared to deal with problems

dt: {bc}to cause one to have a very strong and usually unpleasant feeling (such as a feeling of being embarrassed, annoyed, etc.)

dt.t: Just thinking about my old boyfriend {it}makes my toes curl{/it}.

shortdef: to cause one to have a very strong and usually unpleasant feeling (such as a feeling of being embarrassed, annoyed, etc.)

dt: {bc}to bend one's foot down so that the top of it and the front of one's leg form a straight line

dt.t: She forgot to {it}point her toes{/it} when she dove into the water.

shortdef: to bend one's foot down so that the top of it and the front of one's leg form a straight line

dt: {bc}to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt.t: You might {it}step on{/it} some important people's {it}toes{/it} with this project.

shortdef: to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

stems: step on the toes of someone

dt: {bc}to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt.t: You might {it}step on the toes of{/it} some important people with this project.

shortdef: to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt: {bc}to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt.t: You might {it}tread on{/it} some important people's {it}toes{/it} with this project.

shortdef: to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

stems: tread on the toes of someone

dt: {bc}to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt.t: You might {it}tread on the toes of{/it} some important people with this project.

shortdef: to do something that upsets or offends (someone)

dt: {bc}the innermost and largest toe of the foot

shortdef: the innermost and largest toe of the foot —called also great toe
